backend/main.mo: Defines actor state and data types for posts, NFTs, chat, notifications, live events, profiles, and monetization, integrating authorization and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing VR‑related navigation removal changes and the files affected for three features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend components and pages in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component handling authentication, profile setup, theming, and rendering MainLayout with global background.
frontend/src/components/AppBackground.ts: Simple component rendering the global background wrapper and image.
frontend/src/components/audio/AudioAsset: Displays a list of audio attachments, supports selecting and previewing audio, and provides UI states for loading and empty lists.
frontend/src/components/avatar-closet/Cl: Renders tab buttons for wardrobe categories and triggers category changes.
frontend/src/components/avatar-closet/Wa: Shows a selectable wardrobe item with a color preview and selection indicator.
Displays wardrobe items in a responsive grid and handles item selection.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPreview.ts: SVG-based avatar renderer using config and equipped look to draw body, head, outfit, and accessories.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Five‑tab bottom navigation bar for pitch‑mode modules with icons and active tab highlighting, with VR removed.
frontend/src/components/CreateButton.tsx: Floating action button that opens different creation dialogs or sheets based on the active module.
frontend/src/components/CreatePostDialog: Modal for creating posts with text, optional image upload, and optional audio attachment.
frontend/src/components/gaming/CreateVRS: A deprecated VR space creation dialog that informs users to use the hub instead.
frontend/src/components/gaming/EnterVRSp: Shows details for a VR world and provides a placeholder enter action with toast messaging.
frontend/src/components/gaming/GameDetai: Displays detailed game info, images, and placeholder actions for play, preview, and VR.
frontend/src/components/gaming/VRSpacesP: Presents a placeholder VR spaces list with sample entries and a coming‑soon notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing branding, notifications, and optional live events button.
frontend/src/components/InvestorFlowStep: Bottom stepper that advances users through a predefined module flow sequence.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Primary app layout managing active module, view navigation, and routing to various feature pages.
frontend/src/components/music/AudioUploa: UI card for selecting, previewing, and uploading audio files with validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/music/ComposerPl: Simple tone pad interface that plays sine-wave notes and a demo sequence using Web Audio API.
frontend/src/components/music/CreateAudi: Bottom sheet that switches between audio composition, file upload, and a selection menu.
frontend/src/components/nft/AirExperienc: Three toggle cards letting users enable shoe NFT features across game, VR, and avatar contexts.
frontend/src/components/nft/ClaimShoeNFT: Multi‑step modal for selecting a shoe design and generating an NFT with simulated progress.
frontend/src/components/nft/ListShoeNFTM: Three‑step modal for pricing and listing a shoe NFT on the marketplace with simulated listing logic.
frontend/src/components/nft/NFTCard.tsx: Clickable NFT preview card showing image, name, and rarity styling.
frontend/src/components/nft/NFTDetailPan: Empty file or placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/NotificationsDra: Slide-up drawer displaying a list of mock user notifications.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a social post with author info, content, optional media, audio playback, and basic actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Forces initial profile setup by collecting username and bio and saving them via an API call.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating it on identity change and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAvatarConfig.ts: Manages avatar configuration state with load, save, revert, and unsaved-change detection using local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, handling login flow, and exposing identity state to components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks wrapping backend actor methods for user profiles, posts, audio attachments, and other data operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining theme variables, backgrounds, pitch mode visuals, and UI component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/mock/accessoriesMarketplace: Provides mock accessory marketplace item types and placeholder data for various shoe-related accessories.
frontend/src/mock/avatarClosetPlaceholde: Contains mock wardrobe items for shoes, accessories, and outfits with helpers to fetch items by category or ID.
frontend/src/mock/gamingPortalPlaceholde: Defines game types, platforms, and a mock list of games with metadata for the gaming portal.
Defines an NFT placeholder interface, toggle flag, and sample NFT metadata used for the NFT portal.
frontend/src/pages/AIRBrandCreatorSlotsP: UI page for managing creator slots, including creating, editing, deleting, and storing slot data via local storage.
frontend/src/pages/AIRGameVRDetailPage.t: Detail page for games or VR worlds with favorites, ratings, comments, and placeholder interaction actions.
frontend/src/pages/AIRPlayAnywherePage.t: Provides platform connection and launch simulation for games or VR worlds across multiple device types.
frontend/src/pages/AIRspaceLiveEventsPag: Fetches and lists active live events with join actions, loading states, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/AIRspaceMessagingPage: Shows chat threads, friend requests, and notifications with actions to accept or reject requests.
frontend/src/pages/AIRspaceMonetizationP: Loads creator monetization settings, allows toggling features and themes, and saves config updates.
frontend/src/pages/AIRspacePage.tsx: Displays the user's feed by fetching and sorting portfolio posts, with profile navigation.
frontend/src/pages/AIRspaceProfilePage.t: Renders a user profile with avatar, posts, NFTs, follow state, and related async media loading.
frontend/src/pages/AIRVRSpaceCreationPag: VR space builder page enabling scene editing, object placement, environment settings, and saving drafts.
frontend/src/pages/AIRVRSpacesHubPage.ts: Displays a hub of mock and locally stored VR worlds, with category icons and navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarBuilderPage.tsx: Provides UI for customizing avatar attributes such as skin tone, face, hair, and body, with live preview and save/revert actions.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarClosetPage.tsx: Manages equipping wardrobe items by category, showing a preview and allowing save of the selected look.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarGamePreviewPage: Previews the avatar in a game-like scene with equipped items and navigation to related pages.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarGLBGeneratorPag: Generates and downloads a futuristic anime-style avatar GLB file with status feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarSmartCubePrevie: Displays the avatar in a SmartCube-style frame with stance selection and simulated sync capability.
frontend/src/pages/GamingPage.tsx: Renders a gaming portal with search, filtering, and navigation cards, using mock game data to display a filtered list.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Displays a login screen featuring branding, description, and a button that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MusicModulePage.tsx: Provides a music hub with sections for composing, uploading audio, and a placeholder marketplace.
frontend/src/pages/NFTDropsPage.tsx: Shows upcoming NFT drops with countdown timers, placeholder data, and UI for viewing release details.
frontend/src/pages/NutechBrandCreatorDas: Implements a brand dashboard for managing design projects, accessories, and OLED settings with multiple modals and forms.
frontend/src/pages/NutechShoeAccessories: Implements an accessories marketplace page with search, filtering, item detail dialogs, and buy/sell/trade actions using placeholder data.
frontend/src/pages/NutechShoeHealthTrack: Provides a shoe health dashboard with metrics, notifications, and forms to add or update shoe health data via query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/NutechShoeNFTDetailPa: Displays detailed NFT info and allows toggling AIR integration settings with optimistic updates and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/NutechShoeNFTPortalPa: Shows a portal for viewing, claiming, and navigating through NFT-related features, including NFT drops and detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/NuTechXRWorldBuilderP: Loads A-Frame and displays an XR scene with an avatar, equipment assets, and diagnostic controls.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Renders a profile dashboard with user data and navigation to various creator, designer, and NFT tools, plus logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/ScanShoeToNFTPage.tsx: UI page for scanning a shoe to generate a digital twin, including simulated scan animation and status handling.
frontend/src/pages/ShoeDesignerPage.tsx: Interactive shoe design page supporting file uploads, project creation, customization, and backend sync.
frontend/src/pages/ShoewearPage.tsx: Marketplace-style page for browsing shoes and NFTs with search, filters, categories, and view modes.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Displays user wallet details and owned NFTs, loading NFT images dynamically and linking to the NFT portal.
frontend/src/types/aframe-jsx.d.ts: Type definitions enabling JSX support for A-Frame custom HTML elements.
frontend/src/types/aframe-runtime.d.ts: Declares global AFRAME presence on the window object for runtime typing.
frontend/src/types/avatar.ts: Type definitions and constants for avatar configuration including skin, face, hair, and body options.
frontend/src/types/avatarCloset.ts: Wardrobe types for avatar closet items and equipped looks, with defaults.
frontend/src/types/creatorSlots.ts: Types for creator content slots including status, metadata, analytics, and capacity tracking.
frontend/src/types/vrSpaceBuilder.ts: Types for building VR spaces, defining scenes, objects, rules, environment, and published space data.
frontend/src/utils/avatarClosetStorage.t: LocalStorage helpers for saving, loading, and clearing equipped avatar wardrobe looks.
frontend/src/utils/avatarConfigStorage.t: LocalStorage utilities for avatar configuration persistence with validation and defaults.
frontend/src/utils/creatorSlotsStorage.t: LocalStorage helper for loading, saving, updating, and deleting creator slots with capacity tracking.
frontend/src/utils/generateAvatarGLB.ts: Builds a rigged anime-style avatar in Three.js, including skeleton, mesh, materials, and animations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/src/utils/vrSpaceStorage.ts: Manages VR space drafts and published spaces using localStorage with CRUD operations.
frontend/src/xr/nuverseAvatarAssets.ts: Defines static asset paths and clip-name helpers for the NuVerse avatar’s GLB model and animations.
frontend/src/xr/nuverseEquippedItemMappi: Maps equipped item IDs to XR equipment assets, bone attachment metadata, and helper accessors.
frontend/src/xr/registerAFrameAttachment: Registers an A‑Frame component that attaches equipment models to avatar bones with fallback resolution.
frontend/src/xr/registerAFrameXrComponen: Registers an A‑Frame animation controller component to manage avatar stances and animation playback.
frontend/src/xr/xrAttachmentTargets.ts: Defines XR attachment categories and a registry mapping targets to primary and fallback bones, plus helper lookup utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current feature set, versions, and high-level system summary for a React + ICP app.
